sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="home default">2b5f9dc797432110a714bbe3a253af87</macroponent><name>list__simple_1/query</name><preset/><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
  * @param {params} params
  * @param {api} params.api
  * @param {TransformApiHelpers} params.helpers
  */
function evaluateProperty({api, helpers}) {

var startTimestamp=api.state.starting_date;
var endTimestamp=api.state.ending_date;

var startGDT = new api.GlideDateTime();
startGDT.setNumericValue(startTimestamp);
var endGDT = new api.GlideDateTime();
endGDT.setNumericValue(endTimestamp);

var queryfilter='due_date>='+startGDT+'^duedate<='+endGDT;
//api.setState('needit_filter',queryfilter);
return queryfilter;
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-06-01 16:56:32</sys_created_on><sys_id>c50181e3978b2110a714bbe3a253af7e</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>list__simple_1/query</sys_name><sys_package display_value="NeedIt" source="x_58872_needit">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="NeedIt">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_c50181e3978b2110a714bbe3a253af7e</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-06-02 17:05:44</sys_updated_on><target>macroponent</target><type>transform</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
